name: Demon Spore
detailed_description:
Deep inside a genetic research laboratory, a tissue replication experiment has gone wrong and given birth to a viral mass of cells that is spreading out of control and evolving into a creature from hell. As a scientist trapped inside with a few survivors, use your scientific experience to learn how the organism behaves, find it’s weaknesses and fight your way to safety.

ENEMY UNKNOWN

An abomination of flesh and tentacles with a taste for organic matter, constantly evolving and adapting, infecting everything - even your fellow scientist can turn against you. Escape each floor before the growth mutates into something even more horrific.

SURVIVOR TEAM

Every room has new surprises and tough choices - risk a dangerous encounter to grab new gear? Save a scientist or cut your losses and run to the exit? Rescue and protect lab personnel so they can create new technology to improve your chances of survival.

RESOURCEFUL CARNAGE

Use any lab tools you can find to slice through the creature’s tentacles, target its weak spots and stunt the growth. Cobble together experimental weaponry and repurpose lab equipment to improvise your way to safety in an ever changing environment.

PANIC LAB

Each room has different threats and different rewards, choose your path wisely to stay one step ahead of the creature. Every time you play you face a different layout but will learn more of the secrets of the lab and how to use them to your advantage to outsmart your enemy.

Use the lab to your advantage and improvise an escape plan before this constantly evolving life form spreads out of control.

name: Find Exit
detailed_description:
When you wake up, you find yourself in a surreal world full of amazing things, but have you woken up?

What is a dream?
Memories from past lives?
Projection of pictures from the subconscious?

You don't know who you are.
You don't know where you are.
You don't know what to do.

Maybe it's time to wake up?

Find Exit — is a art work with an open world full of secrets. In the game you have to solve riddles relying solely on your intellect, use: abstract, logical and associative methods of thinking, perhaps then the way out will open to you. The game is based on a silent narrative, and also proceeds from the fact that an intelligent person who values ​​his time interacts with it. Not a single game element exists just for complication, every detail carries a thought. The whole picture is saturated with meaning. Travel, contemplate, analyze the world around you, and discover all its secrets by solving riddles.

The game contains mixed genres such as puzzle, psychological horror, slasher.

name: Hullbreakers
detailed_description:
W - Upgrade


Upgrading your ship resets its HP, as well as teleports towards your crosshair up to a maximum range.
Each time you upgrade back to the original ship, your gain a permanent damage buff.

Shift - Dash


Dashes towards your crosshair. Useful for repositioning.

ESC - To pause and/or quit.

DISCLAIMER

This is a FREE game made by students at the University of Houston as a project for the class Intro to Game Development. NOT a professional game created for-profit. If you enjoy Hullbreakers, I highly recommend you play the game it was inspired and designed from: Nova Drift.

name: Oppcium
detailed_description:
Oppcium is a survival horror game where you play as Melissa Winston as she investigates a government facility. Stealth is a core mechanic, together with exploration, puzzle-solving, and resource management.

Chapter 1:



Explore and investigate the vast area that covers the perimeter of the futuristic facility. Scour for resources and fabricate tools out of blueprints that will further aid you with the investigation.



Work together with Sabine, a cybernetic organism tasked to aid you in uncovering the crisis that left the whole facility silent.



Delve deep into the corridors of S02/47-B and avoid the ever-expanding threat that lurks around the corners.



Get immersed in a True FPS experience and try to make the best out of an unpredictable situation.



DISCLAIMER:
- Very difficult game.
- Involves backtracking through a relatively open world.
- 3-6 hours of gameplay per chapter. (Chapter 1/3)
- No hand-holding.

name: Palphone-sama : Curse call
detailed_description:
Reality-Intertwined Urban Legend Narrative horror
This is an adventure game that uses the Internet to uncover the secrets.



All of the Twitter accounts and Websites in this game actually exist!



This is a highly unique experience where you must use the information you find on the internet to interact with the game!

“Palphone '' is a popular calling and live streaming app.


You are tasked with investigating an urban legend born from a horror movie surrounding Palphone. In order to uncover the secrets, you must make full use of the internet to search for clues from the movie's official website and accounts!



Hopefully, nothing unusual will happen to you in real life as you get closer to the truth of the urban legend…

Side Reader PDF

Palphone Side Reader(PDF / Contains 10 topics)

You can enjoy the game creator HIJIKI's commentary on urban legends and internet culture in Japan, which inspired the creation of Palphone-sama.
Read it after you play the game to learn more about the world of Palphone-sama.

short_description: All of the Twitter accounts and Websites in the game exist in reality. Use your Internet browser to gather information and uncover hidden secrets, and get to the bottom of the urban legend surrounding the popular calling and live streaming App "Palphone"!
reviews:
“It was especially wonderful that the game was created without losing sight of the player's perspective, without being swamped by the special gimmick of Reality-Intertwined.”
Novelsphere

name: Lake of Creatures
detailed_description:
Join The Discord


About the Game

Lake of Creatures is a fast-paced action fishing roguelike, where you're on a quest to hunt down a mythical lake monster.

FEATURES:

  • Randomly Generated Runs. In each run you hop into freshly generated lakes finding different gear, enemies and secrets every time!

  • Combat Modifying Upgrade Synergies. The lakes are filled with lost relics that grant you all kinds of powers. Combining these powers might make you more powerful (or not). Take caution when combining their effects as your success depends on them!

  • Unique Fishing. Swing your fishing rod to cast out the physics based fishing line. Once a fish is hooked prepare yourself, since big fishes ain't going down without a fight.

  • Catching and selling fish is mandatory, since buying more equipment will further improve your chances of success.

  • Fast-Paced Juicy Combat With Roguelike Elements. Juicy twin-stick shooter with roguelike features such as gameplay modifying upgrades, procedurally generated levels and permadeath.

name: RGBY
detailed_description:
Each player should cooperate with others to clear the stage.
Dodge the flying bullets, destroy the enemies, and defeat a massive one!
Sometimes, great victory requires your courage to stand in front of bullets instead.

Color System

4 Players have their own color.
The enemies and bullets with a certain color can only be destroyed and absorbed by players of their color.

Cooperation?

Oh, you don’t like that guy?
Don’t be patient.
Just shoot them up to... Ha! In your face!
Block their pathway and knock them back.
Play with your friends and troll them.


Features
  • 4 Players Local Multiplayer
  • Adventure Mode
  • Massive enemy
  • Four playable characters
